title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 40.2 - Atlantic salmon
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 40.2 - Atlantic salmon

State Regulations

No person shall take Atlantic salmon from the waters of the
marine and coastal district. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
40.2

Amended, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 29, effective
7/23/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
